title: Participatory Consulting Service Design Based on Experiential Learning for Small-scale Farmers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural value chain concepts, understanding of participatory teaching methods, awareness of small-scale farm operations
context.additional_context: Need to establish an asynchronous collaborative learning environment using digital devices. Operation centers on virtual consulting role-playing and case analysis among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three experiential learning models utilizing small-scale farm family resources (human and material resources).
Learners can apply a participatory consulting service design framework to solve agricultural value chain problems.
Learners can conduct consulting simulations with over 80% interaction rates in large-scale learner environments using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
